bibl.title: Rhodian Amphorae in Rhodes and Alexandria as Evidence of Trade.
bibl.note: See pp. 195-199: The Rhodian stamped amphora handles from Alexandria: The Polish excavations at Kôm el-Dikka; - Amphora stamps in the Benaki collection; - Other finds from Alexandria.

bibl.title: Hellenistic Rhodes: Politics, Culture, and Society

bibl.seg: LUND John, Rhodian Amphorae in Rhodes and Alexandria as Evidence of Trade.

Per BILDE, Troels ENGBERG-PEDERSEN, Lise HANNESTAD and Jan ZAHLE (Edd.), Hellenistic Rhodes: Politics, Culture, and Society = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. IX (Aarhus, 1999) pp. 187-204, 14 graphiques.
See pp. 195-199: The Rhodian stamped amphora handles from Alexandria: The Polish excavations at Kôm el-Dikka; - Amphora stamps in the Benaki collection; - Other finds from Alexandria.
C.R. par Hans-Ulrich Wiemer, MBAH 21 (2002) No. 1, pp. 95-104.
